objects.text: • ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION • 20 HOUR BATTERY • SPATIAL AUDIO

product_details.name: Apple AirPods Max Wireless Over-Ear Headphones, Active Noise Cancelling, Transparency Mode, Personalized Spatial Audio, Dolby Atmos, Bluetooth Headphones for iPhone – Pink
product_details.description: Headphones Jack: Lightning. Model Name: AirPods Max. Connectivity Technology: Wireless, Wired. Wireless Communication Technology: Bluetooth, NFC. Age Range (Description): Adult. Material: memory foam. Specific Uses For Product: Music. Recommended Uses For Product: Calling, Recording, Exercising, Gaming, Disc Jockey Use. Compatible Devices: Cellphones, Tablets, Telephones, Music Production Equipment, Laptops, Desktops. Theme: TV Series. Control Type: Call Control, Media Control, Volume Control, Voice Control, Noise Control. Cable Feature: Detachable. Item Weight: 13.6 ounces. Water Resistance Level: Not Water Resistant. Unit Count: 1.0 Count. Style: Lightning. Control Method: Touch. Number of Items: 1. Battery Life: 20 Hour. Product Dimensions: 9.43 x 9.57 x 3.15 inches. Language: English, English, English, English, English. Batteries: 2 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included).

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek promotional layout centered around a product image of headphones. The large image is overlayed on a circular, softly glowing radial background within a full pink gradient backdrop. Text elements are arranged for visual hierarchy: the primary heading (`heading`) sits prominently at the top in bold capital letters, followed by a subheading (`subheading`) emphasizing premium quality. A price badge (`price`) in a red circular gradient overlays the product, capturing attention. Supporting information (`description`) highlights product features along the bottom. The call-to-action button (`cta`) with "SHOP NOW" is prominently placed beneath, drawing immediate interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink: `#FFF0F5`, `#FFB6C1`
- Red Accents: `#E53935`, `#FF6B6B`
- Primary Text: `#9C0052`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases headphones in a chic and modern color palette, primarily featuring Coral Red (#F64B4B), Rose Gold (#E4A4A1), Soft Pink Mesh (#F5B5B5), and Silver/Chrome accents (#C0C0C0). The headband uses a matte coral red tone that contrasts elegantly with the smooth, metallic rose gold earcups, drawing immediate attention. The ear cushions add softness with a pink mesh texture that blends into the central structure, providing depth and a tactile appearance. Highlighting is achieved using light gradients and subtle reflections, making the product feel premium and dynamic. A banner should incorporate these blended warm tones with clean, minimal backgrounds for maximum product focus.
